example.parse: (IP (ADVP (AD 此外)) (PU ，) (NP-SBJ (CP (WHNP-1 (-NONE- *OP*)) (CP (IP (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *T*-1)) (VP (NP-TMP (DP (DT 本)) (NP (NN 月))) (ADVP (AD 刚刚)) (VP (VV 获得) (NP-OBJ (ADJP (JJ 职业)) (NP (NN 资格)))))) (DEC 的))) (NP (NN 新手们))) (VP (ADVP (AD 也)) (ADVP (AD 将)) (VP (VCD (VV 登场) (VV 亮相)))) (PU 。))
